subject: Negotiation
title: The Power of Silence
description: Learn The Power of Silence in one minute.

hook.text: After making an offer, the first person to speak usually loses.

buildup.text: Silence creates discomfort, and discomfort pushes them to fill the gap with concessions.

discovery.text: Skilled negotiators use 3-5 second pauses after key statements to let pressure build.

twist.text: Most people can't stand silence for four seconds ‚Äî they'll lower their price to end it.

climax.text: Silence costs nothing, signals confidence, and gives you time to think.

punchline.text: The best move is sometimes no words at all.

quiz.question: Why is silence powerful in negotiation?
options: Discomfort pushes the other side to make concessions
